attributes.action: Sack all members of parliament if Brexit doesn’t happen on March 29th
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is in the news every day for all to see. Stop bickering with each other and get on with it. Any MP who voted remain should honour the fact the majority voted leave. If an MP wins a local election by 51% they win, it doesn’t mean we back the one who came second and campaign and vote again and again until that one wins.
attributes.background: The majority of the UK voted leave, we’ve had time to sort this mess out. If we can’t get Brexit sorted by the March 29th the Government should be dissolved and any current MP should not be allowed to stand for a seat again at any point in their lifetime because they clearly aren’t up to task.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions. 

You might like to consider signing this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
